document_data.mainbody:
Shoreside Shipping Consortium was a shipping company part of the Mariners Alliance of Daggerford that operated throughout the length of Delimbiyr River circa 1372 DR.
Like many other shipping companies, Shoreside Shipping Consortium was a member of the Mariners Alliance, receiving and facilitating contracts and connecting traders of sea and river merchant shipments. Shoreside Shipping Consortium also had ties to a businessman turned Baron, Matagar Bugo.
In 1372 DR , Mariners Alliance stoke a profitable trading deal via Shoreside Shipping Consortium. Barracuda was involved in regular shippings of weapons and armor that passed through Daggerford. Suspiciously enough, Barracudas final destination was omitted from the logs kept in Mariners Alliance guildhall.
Astriel Shalyn, an agent of the Lords Alliance suspected foul play and asked a group of adventurers allied with her to investigate the Mariners Alliance. The adventurers infiltrated the guildhall, eventually recovering the thick ledger that led them to Shoreside Shipping Consortiums vessel Barracuda.
This led them to discover the Mariners Alliance affiliation with Zhentarim in the evil organizations intricate plot of taking over Daggerfords rulership. Shoreside Shipping Consortiums vessel Barracuda was smuggling numerous shipments of weapons and armor to the orc and tanarukk hordes swelling outside the city preparing an invasion, with Zhentarims sponsorship.
*Captain Herab and his shipping vessel the Barracuda circa 1372 DR.
